item.title: ODI
item.description: Full package for ETL Automation tool: UC4 RMS Server Database These work together; ODI isn’t standalone. All stuffs may be installed in the same RMS server. Jobs Handled by (ksh) scripts to run different jobs UC4 Scheduler Agent: defined in uc4 to connect to RMS server. defines path of scripts ODI agent Connect between server & ODI Can also automate UC4 tasks in newer versions.
